title: Chat-First Portfolio (RAG)
summary: Interactive, AI-driven portfolio using a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline to deliver grounded, verifiable answers about experience, skills, and projects. Designed as a recruiter-facing tool prioritizing accuracy, clarity, and accessibility.
process: Created structured JSON-based knowledge base (bio, resume, FAQ, projects) for clean retrieval
Implemented embedding generation and cosine similarity search for local context lookup
Designed prompt templates emphasizing grounded responses, citations, and safety gating
Built fallback behaviors for low-confidence results to reduce hallucinations
Developed Next.js UI with responsive design, keyboard accessibility, and dark/light themes
Added event logging to understand common recruiter questions and improve content coverage
impact: Provided an instant, interactive way for recruiters to understand my skills without reading long pages
Reduced misinformation by restricting answers to verified resume/project data
Showcased ability to integrate LLMs, vector search, and front-end engineering into a cohesive system
Demonstrated UX thinking, accessibility design, and full-stack engineering skills in one project
